pbi.title: As a KCC employee, I want to create and manage knowledge bank drafts
pbi.description: Implement draft functionality for knowledge bank items, including creating, saving, editing, and deleting drafts before publication
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new draft knowledge items
Drafts can be saved without immediate publication
Users can cancel draft editing without saving changes
Draft items are only visible to KCC-redacteurs
notes: MVP first slice focuses on basic draft management
No approval process in this iteration
Permissions and roles need to be clearly defined

concerns: Role of 'KCC-redacteurs' needs more precise definition
No specific details on draft versioning

risk_flags.message: Undefined role of 'KCC-redacteurs' may lead to unclear access controls and potential security gaps
Concurrent editing and versioning require robust backend design to prevent data conflicts and maintain draft integrity
Lack of specific UI/UX requirements could result in misaligned implementation and potential rework
Auto-save and draft management might introduce additional system load requiring careful performance optimization

suggestions: Define explicit user roles and permission levels for draft creation, editing, and deletion to ensure clear access control
Specify performance requirements for draft auto-save, including maximum save interval and expected response time under concurrent editing scenarios
Create detailed wireframes or mockups illustrating the draft management interface, including draft list view, edit screen, and version history
Include specific acceptance criteria for draft workflow, such as maximum draft retention period and automatic draft archival/deletion rules
Document technical requirements for draft versioning, including maximum version history length and storage mechanism for draft iterations

risks.description: Undefined permission matrix for 'KCC-redacteurs' creates potential security and access control vulnerabilities
risks.mitigation: Develop comprehensive role-based access control (RBAC) matrix with explicit permissions for draft creation, editing, and deletion

risks.description: Complex concurrent editing and versioning requirements without clear technical specifications
risks.mitigation: Design detailed technical specification for draft versioning, including conflict resolution mechanisms and storage strategy

risks.description: Lack of precise UI/UX requirements may lead to implementation misalignment and potential rework
risks.mitigation: Create detailed wireframes and interaction design specifications before development begins

risks.description: Performance risks associated with auto-save and concurrent draft management functionality
risks.mitigation: Conduct performance testing and define clear performance benchmarks for draft operations

recommendations: Define detailed UI wireframes or mockups
Address outstanding critical and high-priority questions
